name: The Scrapped Nights 2 (EARLY RELEASE)
description:
THIS IS AN EARLY RELEASE

The game is not fully finished but will be soon

You may expect bugs

FULL GAME COMING OUT SOON.

______________________________________________________________________________________

You are returning back to the Scrapyard. You have to find out who HE is.

But HE now has a new friend to help him out.

Face off against 1 new scrapped animatronic In the scrapyard

The game has been renamed to: The Scrapped Nights 2

aka Five Nights at the Scrapyard 2

UPDATES: Fixed bugs, upgraded the looks, added new animatronic.

I DO NOT OWN THE SOUND EFFECTS USED IN THE GAME ALL CREDIT GOES TO: FNaF1, 2, 3, Fnac, and TJoC 

Some sound effects like the piano were made by me

IMPORTANT: CLICK THE GREEN FLAG TO MAKE SURE NO BUGS WILL DISRUPT THE GAME.
